extension.news:
### v1.4.0 (2019-06-06)
Fixed: - Play video fails on video resolving error on iOS (#82) - Video resolver bug due which the best available quality to not always be played (#86)
Added: - Go to community (contextual action) (#87) - Follow community (contextual action) (#88) - Skip to page (contextual action) (#84) - VK user login (setting) (#85)
Changed: - Pagination item (next/last page nr, moved to first pos.) - Unfollow community (user confirmation) - VK user access token setting (invisible) - Notifications - Optimized performance (video lists, play video, debug logging, ...) - Updated language resources - Updated readme
